title: Sans-serif typeface used in Max Joseph magazine (art directed by Mirko Borsche)
content:
Hi,

I'm trying to ID this sans-serif typeface found in the Max Joseph magazine, art directed by Bureau Mirko Borsche.  
Can anyone recognize it?

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317210826im_/http:/typophile.com/files/max-joseph01_3475.jpg)

Font: 

 Merkury (Radim Pesko) 

Solved By: 

 [DPape](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317210826/http:/typophile.com/user/3945 "View user profile.")
author: manifold

comments.content: Not quite. The lowercase i and l are pretty different. But close.
Looks like Dick nailed it to me - good find!

This is the character display from the web site.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317210826im_/http:/typophile.com/files/keine3_5960.jpg)

My bad! I was looking at the mono version. You're right!  
Thanks!
